<% var addedItems = []; %> <%_.each(this.model.get('items'), function(item, i){ %> <% if(_.indexOf(addedItems, item.entry.content.get('menu.label')) === -1) {%> <%-_(item.entry.content.get('menu.label')).t() || _(item.entry.get('name')).t() || ''%> <% addedItems.push(item.entry.content.get('menu.label')); %> <%}%> <%});%>
